Class PreferenceHelper

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Helper methods for working with application preferences. Provides categorization for UI display, default value resolution, and comprehensive validation for all preference types.

public static class PreferenceHelper
Inheritance
object
PreferenceHelper
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Remarks

This class works in conjunction with:

  • PreferenceKeys - Defines all available preference keys
  • PreferenceDefaults - Provides default values
  • ISettingsService - Service that uses these helpers

All methods are thread-safe as the class is static and immutable. Validation uses compiled regular expressions for performance.

Methods

GetCategorizedKeys()

Gets all preference keys organized by category for UI display.

public static Dictionary<string, List<string>> GetCategorizedKeys()

Returns

Dictionary<string, List<string>>

A dictionary where keys are category names and values are lists of preference keys in that category.

Remarks

This method is designed to be used by settings UI to render categorized preference panels. Categories are localized in Spanish as the primary UI language.

GetDefaultValue(string)

Gets the default value for a preference key.

public static string GetDefaultValue(string key)

Parameters

key string

The preference key.

Returns

string

The default value as a string.

Remarks

Defaults are defined in PreferenceDefaults. Returns empty string for unknown keys.

GetEnumOptions(string)

Gets the list of valid options for an enum-based preference.

public static List<string> GetEnumOptions(string key)

Parameters

key string

The preference key.

Returns

List<string>

A list of valid option strings, or empty list if not an enum.

Remarks

Used by UI to populate dropdown lists for enum-type preferences.

GetPreferenceType(string)

Determines the data type of a preference based on its key.

public static PreferenceType GetPreferenceType(string key)

Parameters

key string

The preference key.

Returns

PreferenceType

The PreferenceType of the preference.

Remarks

Used by UI to render appropriate input controls (checkbox, number field, dropdown, etc.).

ValidateValue(string, string)

Validates a preference value according to its key's validation rules.

public static bool ValidateValue(string key, string value)

Parameters

key string

The preference key.

value string

The value to validate.

Returns

bool

True if the value is valid for the specified key; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Performs type-specific validation:

  • Enum values: checks against allowed options
  • Numeric values: range checking and parsing
  • Boolean values: verifies "true"/"false" strings
  • Colors: validates hex format (#RGB, #RRGGBB, #RRGGBBAA)
  • URLs: validates URI format
  • Time ranges: validates HH:MM-HH:MM format
